text:
This isn't exactly a tool, so if I'm posting in the wrong place, let me know, but this seemed like the most appropriate channel. We're considering hiring Animalz but I need to provide our SVP with some references. We're <http://Homeward.com|Homeward.com>, a fast-growing real state startup and we need some outside help to support our product and geo expansion ambitions.

I know Jimmy comes from Animalz and has great to say, but is there anyone here that has worked with them that would be willing to provide some feedback? Maybe even discuss their engagement on the phone? TIA.
